Am 23.04.10 08:51, schrieb Jï¿½rn Wildt:

> A POST operation may yield a result with no body at all and a return
> code of
> 204 No Content. In that case, what is the response content type header? Can
> it simply be left out?

Yes, you can leave it out. If there is no content, then there is no type
of content.

-billy.
